snippet: Felix Baumgartner, who is seeking to break the sound barrier by jumping from a balloon about 22 miles in the air, had to postpone his takeoff on Tuesday morning.
abstract: Felix Baumgartner, Austrian parachutist who is seeking to break the sound barrier by jumping from a balloon about 22 miles in the air, postpones his takeoff when a gust of wind twists his balloon.
lead_paragraph: Felix Baumgartner, who is seeking to break the sound barrier by jumping from a balloon about 22 miles in the air, had to postpone his takeoff on Tuesday morning.
